name: Sonic & SEGA Racing
description: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual". Join Sonic and friends in a frantic battle race to the chequered flag. Select from your favourite Sonic and SEGA characters such as Dr. Eggman, Tails, AiAi, Amigo and many more each in their custom built vehicles and personalised All-Star move to get back into the race! Winning is only part of the fun in Sonic & SEGA All-Stars Racing!
